name: Dissonance (DEMO)
description:
DEMO OUT NOW!
Every person has two sides to them. One they let the world see and one they keep to themselves.

Split between two dimensions, you must chip your way through all the puzzle. Is it all just in your very own head?

It might be... 
But no matter what. A life is a life. You'd save yourself, wouldn't you?

Every puzzle is unique and hand crafted. All of them contains not only one, but two different sides to them, which are always connected.


Are you afraid of your own mind? You seem scared.

Do not worry. GAIN is here to help you out! Our friendly robot colleague is here to guide you through all the twists and mazes of this crazy world.

GAIN didn't just pop out of existence though.
Some message logs might help you find the truth.
